Clip.Title: COLDITZ THE LEGEND
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Colditz- a Caste near Leipzig in Germany- was the most feared POW Facility of WW2. This exciting and moving new documentary takes a fresh look at the legend, hearing from both Colditz survivors and their families.

Clip.Title: A STORY OF PEOPLE IN WAR AND PEACE
Clip.Episode: A Story Of People in War and Peace
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Live alongside Armenian soldiers caught in the Karabakh war (89-94) and reunite with them in present day as they search to find answers to the war and lessons for peace.

Clip.Title: CANNIBAL ISLAND
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Amidst the purges of the Stalin-era, dissidents sent to a remote prison camp resort to desperate measures to survive.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From the remote Northern Shore of Nova Scotia, to the red mud perimetre of Prince Edward Island, the warm waters of the Northumberland Strait are the setting for an incredible aerial exploration of these coastlines.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From the port city of Halifax, to the historic Acadian shores and international waters beyond, this aerial exploration documents the treasures and mysteries of Nova Scotia's Southern coast.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE

Clip.Title: WARSHIPS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride along with a Canadian fleet of Warships as they patrol the Persian Gulf.

Clip.EpisodeSummary: Live alongside Armenian soldiers caught in the Karabakh war (89-94) and reunite with them in present day as they search to find answers to the war and lessons for peace.

Clip.Title: THE SILK ROAD
Clip.Episode: Steep Road to the Oasis: Kyrgyzstan & Uzbekistan
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Visit the new cities that have emerged near the border between Kyrgyzstan and China, and the people who live side-by-side in harmony amidst the uncertainties after the collapse of the former Soviet Union.

Clip.Title: NAZI TEMPLE OF DOOM
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Discover the astonishing secrets behind a recently found artifact. Our investigation uncovers a story of intrigue, shady deals, and a plot by Nazi leader Heinrich Himmler to create a sinister Camelot inside "The Nazi Temple of Doom," Germany's Wewelsburg Castle.

Clip.Title: MISSION TO MURDER HITLER
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The operation Valkyrie to kill Hitler was led by German resistance willing to turn traitor to save lives. See how the plot was nearly carried out, through gripping re-enactments, and firsthand interviews from members of the resistance.

Clip.Title: CANADA 1812: FORGED IN FIRE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Isaac Brocks's daring made him a hero during the early months of the War of 1812, but it may also have been his fatal flaw.

Clip.Title: WARSHIPS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride along with a Canadian fleet of Warships as they patrol the Persian Gulf.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From the outskirts of Vancouver, to world famous Whistler-Blackcombe - the Sea to Sky corridor reveals one of the West Coast's most iconic landscapes.

Clip.Title: AERIAL AMERICA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Zoom above some of America's greatest landcapes and monuments in stunning HD realism.

Clip.Title: AERIAL AMERICA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From its Great Lakes to its Grand Canyon, its Rocky Mountain peaks to its Key West reefs, America is a land of amazing destinations. This aerial adventure over the nation's most remarkable landscapes and landmarks captures the breathtaking beauty of America, while demonstrating how its sense of wonder has inspired countless artists, thinkers, and revolutionaries.

Clip.Title: CIVIL WAR 360
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Take a journey back in time and immerse yourself in a 150-year-old battle that nearly split our nation in two. This three-part series explores famous and little known aspects of the Civil War, from the perspectives of the Union, the Confederacy and the millions of enslaved people struggling for freedom. Hosted by Ashley Judd, Trace Adkins, and Dennis Haysbert, all of whom had ancestors greatly affected by the war, this series delivers fresh insights and untold tales, brought to life through dramatic recreations and the Smithsonian Institution's vast collection of artifacts.

Clip.Title: AERIAL AMERICA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Zoom above some of America's greatest landcapes and monuments in stunning HD realism.
